name: Bane of Survival
description:
Game created for KenneyJam 2020 (theme: CURSED).

DISCLAIMER: It's our first jam XD.

Sooner rather than later you will find out that this is no ordinary game, because it has a CURSE. The game has a slight probability of "corrupting" in various ways and, the longer you play, the weirder and unplayable it gets.

Try  to dodge the spikes and the corrupted animals in order to survive. There will be some visual distractions as well as "physical" obstacles for your character.

Last at least 30 seconds to discover all types of corruption.

To move use WASD to move around and jump.

EH - Visual design, Ideas

ZL - Programmer

AC - Composer, Ideas

CIJ - Lead programmer
